p: Steroidal and nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory agents are commonly used in the clinical treatment of inflammatory diseases. Long-term use of these drugs can cause serious adverse reactions, such as gastrointestinal tract, cardiovascular, and liver abnormalities [ 8]. Finding a safe and effective drug to control inflammation has always been a challenge. In recent years, Chinese herbal oils have been rated as the safest, most promising anti-inflammatory drug candidate [ 2].
